title: Munchery and Belcampo Meat Co. Partner to Deliver Organic, Heritage Meats to the Bay Area
text:
July 17, 2015 09:00 ET Munchery and Belcampo Meat Co. Partner to Deliver Organic, Heritage Meats to the Bay Area 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA--(Marketwired - Jul 17, 2015) - Munchery , the leader in high-quality meal delivery, and Belcampo Meat Co. , the first of its kind in butchery, today announce a partnership to make premium meats more accessible in the San Francisco Bay Area. Munchery will deliver chef-prepared meals made with Belcampo's humanely-raised, organic meats directly to people in the Bay Area, expanding the availability of Belcampo's products beyond its butcher shops and restaurants. 
"Serving local, sustainable and delicious ingredients is fundamental to the Munchery vision, and there are few companies in the world that represent that ideal more than Belcampo," said Munchery VP of Food, Nicolas Bernadi. "This partnership is only the beginning of our mission to make it easier for people across America to discover and enjoy high-quality ingredients -- and to help diners learn about innovative, mindful food suppliers in their cities like Belcampo." 
The new collaboration was born from both companies' commitment to sourcing from local suppliers to bring the best possible products to customers everywhere. Through its vertically integrated farms and state-of-the-art processing plant in California's Shasta Valley, as well as its butcher shop and restaurant locations, Belcampo directly manages the entire meat production chain to minimize waste and ensure quality. Munchery also employs an end-to-end model in preparing meals in-house for direct delivery to customers. 
"Partnering with Munchery allows us to offer our proprietary line of organic meats, expertly prepared in new ways, straight to customers in the Bay Area," said Belcampo CEO Anya Fernald. "We're giving people who care about food safety, flavor and environmental responsibility a new way to experience Belcampo's array of flavorful and sustainable meats." 
Belcampo currently operates three locations in the Bay Area, including its flagship store and restaurant in Marin, with plans to open a fourth Bay Area butcher shop this summer. Munchery's model of purchasing and cooking at scale will enable it to offer Belcampo entrees for roughly $15, compared to an average cost of $25 at Belcampo restaurants. 
Belcampo Culinary Director Ross Wollen will work with Munchery chefs Bridget Batson, Steven Levine and Raymond Reyes to develop the menu. During the week of July 20, Munchery will feature one kind of Belcampo meat per day from Monday to Thursday. After launch, Belcampo meats will be available in limited quantities on the first Tuesday of each month. Initial menu items include lamb meatballs with couscous, pork sirloin with farro and chimichurri, beef bourguignon pasta and BBQ chicken sandwich with coleslaw. Each order will include a coupon for Belcampo's brick-and-mortar locations. The menu opens for pre-order today. 
About Munchery Munchery is a new kind of food company on a mission to make real food accessible to everyone, everywhere. The team of critically-acclaimed chefs prepares locally-sourced meals, delivered chilled to ensure maximum freshness. Munchery currently operates in San Francisco, Seattle, New York City and Los Angeles, with plans to expand to additional cities. Customers can order on demand or schedule delivery up to ten days in advance. For every order placed, Munchery feeds a person in need through a local food bank. For more information, visit Munchery's website , Facebook , Twitter and Instagram . 
About Belcampo Meat Co. A farm, processing plant and butcher shop, Belcampo Meat Co. is redefining the meat industry by offering delicious, organic and humanely raised meat. All meats are sourced directly from its farm in Shasta Valley, where there is an emphasis on heritage breed animals selected for great taste quality. Belcampo continues its efforts to humanely raise the animals and handle the meat via Belcampo Butchery, one of the few USDA certified, multi-species meat processing facilities to open in California in the past two decades. By controlling the entire production chain -- from the farm, to the slaughter and processing, right through to the point of sale -- Belcampo Meat Co. offers an unparalleled experience for consumers concerned about food safety, environmental responsibility and taste quality. Belcampo has stores and restaurant locations in Marin, Downtown Los Angeles, Santa Barbara, San Francisco, Palo Alto and Santa Monica, with plans to expand to additional markets, including West Hollywood. In 2015, Belcampo debuted its collection of Butcher Boxes, highlighting themed assortments of various meat cuts, available exclusively through its online store.
